profile

flipBreaker(uint256).details: modifer onlyCron, onlyExecutive Enable or disable the circuit breaker

params._as: uint: the uuid of the user tring to flip the circuit breaker

returns._state: bool: true if the circuit is broken, and false otherwise

params._uuid: uint: the userID being looked up

returns._balance: uint: the number of MUBC tokens the*

mint(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: modifier onlyCron, onlyExecutive Create new incentive tokens. Reason for minting should be derived from _as

params._as: : specifies who minted the tokens - value of 0 denotes bounty minting - value =/= 0 specifies the userID who minted the transaction for record purposes*
params._uuid: uint: the userID of the incentive's recipient
params._value: : the quantity of tokens being minted to the recipient

returns._awards: uint[]: array of all bountyIDs this account has been awarded*
returns._balance: uint: the user's current MUBC Incentive Token balance
returns._purchases: uint[]: array of all itemIDs this account owns on the MUBC Incentive Network
returns._uniqueID: string: the identifying string given to students by Miami University

register(string,string,bool).details: modifier onlyCron Register a new user onto the MUBC Token network

params._executive: bool: true if the user should be enrolled with permissions, and false otherwise
params._uniqueID: string: the uniqueID used by Miami University to identify its students

returns._uuid: uint: userSerial of the newly registered account*

getBalance(uint256).notice: Return the balance of a given userID

profile(uint256).notice: Return the data associated with a user profile
